name: Petra Bot
description:
Petra is the default 0 A.D. AI bot. Please report issues to Wildfire Games (see the link in the main menu).

The AI difficulty level also determines how much time it takes to train units, build structures, and research technologies (Very Hard 50%, Hard 71%, Medium 100%, Easy 141%, Very Easy 200%, and Sandbox 300%). Also, the Sandbox level does not expand nor attack.
